title: "[Downloader] Timeout" - erigon holesky can't sync
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon version 2.49.1-stable build with repo

OS & Version: Debian 6.1.38-4 (2023-08-08) x86_64 GNU/Linux

Commit hash: 205eeda01fd8f8a2956276d6760b9298f70bd18f

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
```
  --chain holesky
  --datadir /var/lib/erigon
  --torrent.download.rate 1024mb
  --metrics
  --metrics.addr 0.0.0.0
  --metrics.port 6061
  --http.addr 0.0.0.0
  --http.port 8545
  --http.vhosts *
  --http.api eth,debug,net,trace
  --db.pagesize 16kb
  --batchSize 2048MB
  --rpc.returndata.limit 1000000
  --maxpeers 200
```

Concensus Layer: lighthouse

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):
```
  beacon_node
  --network holesky
  --debug-level info
  --datadir /var/lib/lighthouse
  --disable-upnp
  --listen-address 0.0.0.0
  --listen-address ::
  --http
  --http-allow-sync-stalled
  --metrics
  --metrics-address 0.0.0.0
  --execution-endpoints http://127.0.0.1:8551
  --port 9001
  --jwt-secrets=/tmp/jwtsecret
  --disable-log-timestamp=true
```

Chain/Network: Holesky

#### Error Logs
